mapper.select: select ib.board_id as boardId, ib.user_id as userId, ib.creation_id as creationId, ib.created_at as createdAt, ib.view_count as viewCount, ib.content as content, ib.public_check as publicCheck, igd.image_url as imageUrl from image_board ib left join image_generation_data igd ON ib.creation_id = igd.creation_id order by board_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into image_board (user_id, creation_id, content, public_check) values (#{userId}, #{creationId}, #{content}, #{publicCheck})
mapper.delete: delete from board_comments where comment_id = #{commentId} and user_id = #{userId}
